publications.name: Exploring the hidden Universe: A novel phenomenological approach for recovering arbitrary gravitational-wave millilensing configurations
publications.publisher: Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society
publications.summary: This publication introduces model-independent approach for analysing gravitational-wave millilensing
